detaileddescription.para:
Tells whether telephony events payload type is supported within the context of the rtp session.
session
a rtp session
the payload type number used for telephony events if found, -1 if not found.

Tells whether telephone event payload type is supported for send within the context of the rtp session.
session
a rtp session
the payload type number used for telephony events if found, -1 if not found.

Tells whether telephone event payload type is supported for receiving within the context of the rtp session.
session
a rtp session
the payload type number used for telephony events if found, -1 if not found.

Allocates a new rtp packet to be used to add named telephony events. The application can use then rtp_session_add_telephone_event() to add named events to the packet. Finally the packet has to be sent with rtp_session_sendm_with_ts().

parameterdescription.para: boolean to indicate if the marker bit should be set.

simplesect.para: a message block containing the rtp packet if successfull, NULL if the rtp session cannot support telephony event (because the rtp profile it is bound to does not include a telephony event payload type).

memberdef.argsstring: (RtpSession *session, mblk_t *packet, uint8_t event, int end, uint8_t volume, uint16_t duration)
memberdef.name: rtp_session_add_telephone_event

detaileddescription.para:
session
a rtp session.
packet
a rtp packet as a mblk_t
event
the event type as described in rfc2833, ie one of the TEV_* macros.
end
a boolean to indicate if the end bit should be set. (end of tone)
volume
the volume of the telephony tone, as described in rfc2833
duration
the duration of the telephony tone, in timestamp unit.
Adds a named telephony event to a rtp packet previously allocated using rtp_session_create_telephone_event_packet().
Reads telephony events from a rtp packet. *tab points to the beginning of the event buffer.

parameterdescription.para: a rtp session from which telephony events are received.
a rtp packet as a mblk_t.

simplesect.para: the number of events in the packet if successfull, 0 if the packet did not contain telephony events.

detaileddescription.para: This functions creates telephony events packets for dtmf and sends them. It uses rtp_session_create_telephone_event_packet() and rtp_session_add_telephone_event() to create them and finally rtp_session_sendm_with_ts() to send them.

simplesect.para: 0 if successfull, -1 if the session cannot support telephony events or if the dtmf given as argument is not valid.

memberdef.argsstring: (RtpSession *session, char dtmf, uint32_t userts, int duration)
memberdef.name: rtp_session_send_dtmf2

detaileddescription.para: A variation of rtp_session_send_dtmf() with duration specified.

parameterdescription.para: duration of the dtmf in timestamp units

simplesect.para: 0 if successfull, -1 if the session cannot support telephony events or if the dtmf given as argument is not valid.
